---
name: "Pull Request"
about: Submit a change to MechanicsDSL
title: ""
---

## Description
Clearly describe the changes you are making. Which issue (if any) does this PR address?

## Type of Change
- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change which fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix or feature that would cause existing DSL code to fail)
- [ ] Documentation update

## Testing
- [ ] I have run the test suite (pytest) and all tests pass.
- [ ] I have added new tests for this feature/fix.

## Checklist
- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project (PEP 8).
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas.
- [ ] I have updated the documentation accordingly.
